item.title: Israeli Ministers Plan to Vote on Truce With Hezbollah
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was expected to present a deal mediated by U.S. and French diplomats to end fighting that has killed thousands, most...

item.title: Novo Nordisk Foundation CEO dismisses ‘Nokia risk’ as ‘fundamentally different’ for Denmark’s economy
item.description: Novo Nordisk Foundation CEO Mads Krogsgaard Thomsen said only 9 million people are using GLP-1s compared with 1 billion people living with obesity.

item.title: After Trump’s Tariff Threat, Is a China Currency War Next?
item.description: While China could offset American tariffs by letting its currency fall, that might endanger Beijing’s recent efforts to stabilize the economy.

item.title: 16 Still Missing After Tourist Boat Sinks in Egypt
item.description: The vessel was hit by a large wave in a part of the Red Sea coast that is known for diving and snorkeling.

item.title: Fentanyl Rises Again, This Time as Trump’s Diplomatic Weapon Against China

item.title: Russia Fires Record Number of Drones in Overnight Assault, Ukraine Says
item.description: The assault, which the Ukrainian Air Force said involved 188 drones, came as both sides intensify air bombardments.

item.title: Fury Unfolds in Pakistan
